We load lexique:

```{r load}
a = read.csv('lexique_small.csv', fileEncoding='utf-8')
```

First we plot the histogram of log10 of the frequencies of word


```{r histo}
data = hist(log10(a$freq), nclass=100)
plot(data$breaks[-1], log10(data$counts))
```

Now, we select words 

```{r}
lf4 = a$word[a$nbletters==4 & (log10(a$freq)>0) & log10(a$freq)<.5]
hf4 = a$word[a$nbletters==4 & (log10(a$freq)>2) & log10(a$freq)<2.5]
lf6 = a$word[a$nbletters==6 & (log10(a$freq)>0) & log10(a$freq)<.5]
hf6 = a$word[a$nbletters==6 & (log10(a$freq)>2) & log10(a$freq)<2.5]
```


```{r}
nitems = 45
lf4final = sample(lf4, nitems)
hf4final = sample(hf4, nitems)
lf6final = sample(lf6, nitems)
hf6final = sample(hf6, nitems)

```

```{r}
write.csv(data.frame(lf4final, hf4final, lf6final, hf6final), "words.csv")
```
